attributes.action: The house to allow a General election to move this country forward.
attributes.additional_details:
Brexit is currently being bossed by a parliament that is working against the government taking no accountability. While working against the result of the European referendum. 

PARLIAMENT needs to take responsibility and needs a majority government to heal and move this country forward.
attributes.background:
We have a Government with no power but accountability, being bossed around by a Parliament with power but no accountability.

This country needs a working government that is going to move this country in a direction.
